overview:
Francis oversees engineering and operations at mig33. Francis brings 20 years of technology and engineering experience to mig33. Previously, he led engineering and operations at a la Mobile, a developer of mobile Linux software, and Sonim Technologies, a provider of VoIP and push-to-talk solutions. Prior to that, Francis was Vice President of the Device Product Group at Openwave Systems, where he led the development and deployment of the company’s mobile browser product, built and managed a worldwide organization, and shipped software on hundreds of millions of devices across hundreds of models.

Before Openwave, Francis served as Chief Operating Officer of Intellimatch and spent six years at Oracle in various capacities, including senior director roles in engineering, marketing and professional services.

Francis holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science from Florida Atlantic University. He also attended Fudan University in Shanghai, China.

Source: Mig33 Forum [ http://www.mig33forum.com ]
